title: coworking.live
description:
Transform Chrome into your coworking hub. Find active collaborators and boost productivity together. Ideal for remote teams & freelancers seeking the focus of Pomodoro-style sessions. Just as on-screen text evolved from an accessibility feature to a universal standard, we're making virtual coworking the new norm for enhanced productivity.
Key Features:

Live coworker discovery
Simple task management
Real-time collaboration
Pomodoro-inspired focus sessions
